text: Kouassi Kouadja (born 22 June 1995) is an Ivorian footballer, who plays as a defender for Cape Town City. ==Career== In February 2016, Kouadja signed for Kazakhstan Premier League side FC Aktobe. On 29 March 2017, Kouadja re-signed for FC Slutsk, leaving the club when his contract expired 8 June of the same year. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |valign="center"|Saxan Gagauz Yeri |2014–15 |Divizia Națională |15||0||0||0||2||0||17||0 |- |valign="center"|Astra Giurgiu (loan) |2014–15 |Liga I |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- |valign="center"|Slutsk |2015 |Belarusian Premier League |12||0||3||0||colspan="2"|–||15||0 |- |valign="center"|Aktobe |2016 |Kazakhstan Premier League |29||0||0||0||2||0||31||0 |- |valign="center"|Slutsk |2017 |Belarusian Premier League |7||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||7||0 |- |valign="center"|Tambov |2017–18 |Russian Football National League |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !64!!0!!3!!0!!4!!0!!71!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Liga I players Category:Kazakhstan Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Moldova Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate soccer players in South Africa Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:FC Saxan players Category:FC Slutsk players Category:FC Aktobe players Category:Cape Town City F.C.
